mapper.sql: a.channel_id AS "channelId", a.agio_goods_type AS "agioGoodsType", a.agio_gender AS "agioGender", a.agio_season AS "agioSeason", a.agio_brand AS "agioBrand"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO fx_channel_user( channel_id, agio_goods_type, agio_gender, agio_season, agio_brand ) VALUES ( #{channelId}, #{agioGoodsType}, #{agioGender}, #{agioSeason}, #{agioBrand} )
mapper.update: UPDATE fx_channel_user SET channel_id = #{channelId}, agio_goods_type = #{agioGoodsType}, agio_gender = #{agioGender}, agio_season = #{agioSeason}, agio_brand = #{agioBrand} WHERE id = #{id}
